revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Buffalo Kuro-box Pro.jpg |image1_size = 100px |caption = Single Disk NAS Enclosure |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Buffalo_Kuro-box_Pro |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Incompatible |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = Incompatible |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Buffalo |model = Kuro-box |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Pro |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F5182; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = Feroceon core |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 400 / 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;NAND02GW3B2CN6; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SST;39VF020; |flash2size = 256 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Elpida;E5116ANSE; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1118R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:16:01
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.1;Marvell 1.12.1 TINY; |stockos = Linux;2.6.12-6-arm1;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA, PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 120 |pwr_ac_hz = 60 |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_conn = C7
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, fan, |addchip = I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, 8-bit Single-Chip Microcontroller;NEC;Î¼PD78F0500;;1;,,, 16-bit D-Type Latch;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC16373A;;2;,,, Quad Differential PCIe Clock Source;IDT;ICS557-03;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC08A;;1;,,, 30V, 7A Power Switching DC/DC Converter;Rohm Semiconductor;SP8K3;;1;,,, 4A Low Dropout Regulator;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G973;;2;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.11.150 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = kuroadmin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = foonas, FreeLink, Debian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 4981254582268 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000VZWWXW |asin_country = JP |countrymanuf = Japan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * Main board silkscreened with "MADE IN JAPAN" and "MVLS2EG-CA" * PCIe and SATA ports are on sub-board silkscreened with "LSGLSUB-CA" and "MADE IN CHINA"
==Links of Interest== [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buffalo_network-attached_storage_series Kuro-Box Wiki]
[http://buffalo.nas-central.org/wiki/Welcome_to_the_Kurobox_Wiki Buffalo Wiki] alternative firmware
[http://www.cyrius.com/debian/orion/buffalo/kuroboxpro/ Debian on Kurobox]
